Here are the rules...

  • Every time to start the quest, a new code will be generated.
  • For a code of length N, you will be given N chances to break the code.
  • For every guess you make you will be given Color Coded hints.
    • Correct Guess
    • Correct Number, Wrong Position
    • Wrong Guess
  • As the levels progress, difficulties might increase.
  • Are you ready to prove your worth?
